titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Osteoporosis Awareness and Prevention Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Mr. Deal (GA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 265.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Passed House amended. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Osteoporosis Awareness and Prevention Month.
